body:
Okay, let's go with `:` assuming there are no fierce objections.

Implementation-wise, I suggest going in this order:

- [x] Parse notes and record them in the `Section` struct
- [x] Add the command-line flag to enable presenter notes
- [x] Add the notes to the slide template
- [x] Display the notes, synchronize browser windows
- [x] Docs

I also suggest, since notes seem to be the focus here, that the flag be `-notes` rather than `-p`.
